title: Yu Yu Hakusho - Pigeon's Blood (Doujinshi)
description:
Kurama's been acting strangely, worrying Yusuke to the point he chases him down. Hiei gives a cryptic warning, but Yusuke ignores it. Soon enough, he finds himself to be the one in danger.

Doujinshi for the animanga Yu Yu Hakusho. 

Pairing: Kurama/Yusuke.
Rating: R-18
Warnings: Noncon, violence

matches.title: Erotic Fairy Tales - The Little Mermaid
